description.fr:
Lorsqu'une {ObjectMechanism:1763!} est détruite\_:
Inflige {magicalDamage:dmg} autour\_<sprite name="cell_around"> d'elle.
description.en:
When one {ObjectMechanism:1763!} is destroyed:
Does {magicalDamage:dmg} around\_<sprite name="cell_around"> it.
description.es:
Cuando una {ObjectMechanism:1763!} es destruida:
Inflige {magicalDamage:dmg} alrededor\_<sprite name="cell_around"> de ella.
description.de:
Wenn eine\_{ObjectMechanism:1763!} zerstört wird:
Verursacht {magicalDamage:dmg} im Umkreis\_<sprite name="cell_around">.
description.pt:
Quando uma {ObjectMechanism:1763!} é destruída:
Inflige {magicalDamage:dmg} em\_volta\_<sprite name="cell_around"> dela.
